item.title: Pickle's Big Break
item.description:
Percy Picklesworth was a man on the brink. His pickle stand had been shut down twice that week alone, and his bank account was looking like a jar of sour pickles â€“ empty and unfulfilling. He trudged along, his suitcase full of pickle jars, his spirit crushed.

Just as he was about to give up, Percy spotted a colorful flyer on the bulletin board: “Unconventional Wisdom for the Unconvinced.” Intrigued, he ripped off a tab with an address and stuffed it into his pocket. This could be the turn of his life, he thought.
